text:
Created attachment 25204
TestRemoteIpFilter.java

I didn't attach test cases to the RemoteIpFilter when I proposed it because I didn't know how to use  the embedded Tomcat.

I learned how to use it so here are the test cases.
creator: cleclerc@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Test cases added and will be included in 7.0.0 onwards. Many thanks.
